backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a timing update to SegmentedCircumferenceProgress.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading main.tsx and PWA metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root layout with header, footer tabs, and route handling for main app pages.
Breathing circle UI that animates by phase and shows segmented progress when running.
frontend/src/components/charts/BreathHol: Draws an SVG line chart plotting breath-hold durations over time with point markers.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyMin: Shows a weekly bar chart visualizing minutes spent per day using proportional bar heights.
frontend/src/components/CustomPatternFor: Form for editing inhale/hold/exhale durations in a breathing pattern.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseTileCard: Generic exercise card with icon, description, and click handling.
frontend/src/components/HomeExerciseCard: Home exercise card with adjustable duration dialog and start action.
frontend/src/components/SegmentedCircumf: Renders an SVG circular progress indicator split into timed segments, filling segments based on elapsed time.
frontend/src/components/SessionList.tsx: Displays a table of session history with formatted dates and durations, or a message when empty.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeCo: Provides a vertical slider UI for volume control with optional icon display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingEngine.ts: Implements timed breathing phase logic with speech, haptics, pausing, and phase transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useHaptics.ts: Provides a simple wrapper for triggering device vibration if supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerExerciseDuratio: Stores and retrieves customizable exercise durations with local storage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and releases screen wake lock based on an active flag to prevent device sleep.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles, theme variables, typography rules, and breathing animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/ambientAudio.ts: Controls looping rain and waves audio with volume management and exclusive playback.
frontend/src/lib/breathingPatterns.ts: Defines the BreathingPattern interface and exports preset breathing patterns.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageStore.ts: Provides helpers to read and write breathing records, sessions, and durations in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/playerDurationGuards.ts: Validates session durations and determines when auto‑stop should trigger safely.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines types for breath‑hold records and breathing sessions with timestamps and durations.
frontend/src/lib/statsDerivations.ts: Generates daily minutes, breath‑hold chart data, and the latest ten sessions from stored records.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Contains constant localStorage key names for breathing data.
frontend/src/lib/voiceGuidance.ts: Handles speech synthesis for voice guidance, including volume, queued, and async speaking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with app info, premium upsell, and quick settings UI.
frontend/src/pages/Custom.tsx: Allows users to create a custom breathing pattern and start a session with it.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays preset breathing exercises and a breath‑holding test with navigation and duration controls.
frontend/src/pages/Player.tsx: Runs the breathing session player with pattern loading, audio, voice guidance, duration logic, and session logging.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Renders a settings page with toggles for audio, haptics, and notification preferences using cards and switches.
frontend/src/pages/Stats.tsx: Displays weekly minutes, breath-hold trends, and a table of recent sessions using charts and local storage data.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: Implements a breath-hold timer with start/stop controls, live elapsed time, and all‑time record storage.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, screens, and plugins for the app’s design system.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, and architecture metadata for the ZenBreathe app.
